trait.name: Bladesong
entries: While the bladesinger isn't wearing Medium or Heavy armor or using a shield, its AC includes its Intelligence modifier, and it has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on a spell with bonus equal to its Intelligence modifier. Also walking speed of bladesing increases by 10 ft.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The bladesinger has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put it to sleep.

trait.name: Martial Training I
entries: Bladesinger gains bonus +1 to weapon attacks and maneuvers DC.

trait.name: Arcane Training I
entries: Bladesinger gains bonus +1 to spell attacks and spell DC.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bladesinger is a 9th-level spellcaster. It spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared:
footerEntries: 1st Level (4 slots): {@spell longstrider}, {@spell false life}, {@spell false life}, {@spell find familiar}, {@spell shield}
2nd Level (3 slots): {@spell magic weapon}, {@spell mirror image}, {@spell misty step}, {@spell see invisibility},
3rd Level (2 slots): {@spell counterspell}, {@spell fly}, {@spell haste|phb},  {@spell fireball|phb}
4th level (2 slots: {@spell fire shield|phb}, {@spell dimension door|phb}

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bladesinger makes two attacks with its scimitar. Also he can substitute cast cantrip instead of one attack.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@b Hit}: 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.
